DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize control trial evaluate efficacy iodophor-impregnated adhesive drape reduce bacterial count hip surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Bacterial Colonization With Without Iodophor-impregnated Adhesive Drapes Hip Surgery : Prospective , Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: Primary femoroacetabular osteoplasty ( FAO ) patient Primary Periacetabular Osteotomy ( PAO ) patient Total hip arthroplasty ( THA ) patient Revision FAO surgery Septic septic arthritis patient Patients systemic topical allergy iodine
